alert.note: Alert for Inland Martin (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 24 at 7:25PM EDT by NWS Melbourne
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Martin County through 800 PM EDT... At 724 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near J And S Fish Camp, moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... J And S Fish Camp and Port Mayaca. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
